message: Let's start with a fair offer. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%, but we can always negotiate further.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 65/35 split in my favor. This accounts for the time-value of money with inflation considered. Take it or leave it.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better share than 35%. I propose 60/40, considering the time value of money, but I'm open to negotiation.
